participant_1.background:
I love doing zumba to get my heart rate up and feel younger.
i favorite brand of clothing is donna karen.
I like to organize my home and surroundings to keep busy on the weekends.
I have a rocking chair that I like to sit in while reading to my children.
I am not rich, but I am working hard to achieve my financial goals.

participant_2.background:
I am moving to a new city to pursue my dreams.
i am a seventh day adventist.
My drum set is my most valued material possession because it is a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there.
in the evenings i watch the door at a club where they play punkrock.
I am worried that my family would not accept me if I told them I was gay.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I just got a new job and I'm moving to a new city next week.
Congratulations on the new job! I'm sure you'll do great. Moving to a new city can be exciting, but it can also be stressful.
Thanks! I'm both excited and nervous. I've never lived in a big city before, so I'm not sure what to expect.
I'm sure you'll figure it out. What kind of job did you get?
I'm going to be a drum instructor at a music store.
That's awesome! I love music. I used to play the guitar, but I haven't played in a long time.
You should start playing again! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I might just do that. Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk music.
So, what are your hobbies?
I love to play the drums, go to punk rock shows, and watch anime.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love anime too. What's your favorite anime?
My favorite anime is Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood.
That's a great anime! I love the story and the characters.
Me too! It's one of the best anime ever made.
I agree. Have you seen any good anime lately?
I've been watching a lot of Black Clover lately. It's a really good shounen anime.
I've heard good things about that anime. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really funny and action-packed.
Thanks for the recommendation. I'm always looking for new anime to watch.
